def_cn: 大规模的；大范围的；大型的
def_en: A large-scale action or event happens over a very wide area or involves a lot of people or things.

def_cn: （地图或图表）大比例尺的
def_en: A large-scale map or diagram represents a small area of land or a building or machine on a scale that is large enough for small details to be shown.
